design.custom_css: @font-face { font-family: 'amostely_signatureregular'; src: url('https://appfbctoday.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/amostelysignature-webfont.eot'); src: url('https://appfbctoday.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/amostelysignature-webfont.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), url('https://appfbctoday.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/amostelysignature-webfont.woff2') format('woff2'), url('https://appfbctoday.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/amostelysignature-webfont.woff') format('woff'), url('https://appfbctoday.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/amostelysignature-webfont.ttf') format('truetype'), url('https://appfbctoday.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/amostelysignature-webfont.svg#amostely_signatureregular') format('svg'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } ion-title { position: relative; } ion-header { background: url(https://cornerbaptistapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/headerbg.png) center/cover; } ion-header { height: 12vh; } .fixed-content, .scroll-content { margin-top: 0!important; margin-left: 0px; } ion-content.content { margin-top: 12vh!important; height: 108vh; } .fixed-content, .scroll-content { margin-top: 0!important; } ion-navbar { position: absolute; bottom: 0; } ion-header::before { background-image: url(https://cornerbaptistapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/logocorner.png); background-size: contain; background-position: center; display: block; height: 12vh; width: 45vw; content: ''; position: absolute; left: calc(50vw - 22.5vw); background-repeat: no-repeat; z-index: 1; bottom: 1px; } ion-title>div { opacity:0; } .menu-inner ion-header ion-toolbar { position: relative; } .menu-inner ion-header ion-title:after { height: 20px; } button.item ion-label { text-transform: uppercase; margin: 3vh 0; } button.item { padding-right: 16px; } button.item .item-inner { padding: 0!important; } button.item .input-wrapper { text-align:center; font-size: 6vw; letter-spacing: 2px; font-weight: 300; } .back-button.show-back-button { order: 7; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none; } .toolbar-background { background: transparent!important; } .menu-inner { width: 100%!important; background: #fff!important; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(odd) { background: #372862; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(even) { background: #4b357b; } .menu-inner ion-list { margin: 1vh 2vw; width: 96vw; background: #4b357b; } .menu-inner ion-list::before { content: "Menu"; font-size: 20vw; padding: 1vh 0; font-family: 'amostely_signatureregular'; position: relative; text-align: center; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .menu-inner ion-content { } /* X and XS */ @media only screen and (device-width : 375px) and (device-height : 812px) { ion-content.content { margin-top: 8vh!important; height: 92vh; } } /* XR and XS Max */ @media only screen and (device-width : 414px) and (device-height : 896px) { ion-content.content { margin-top: 8vh!important; height: 92vh; } }
